verses.verse: Now the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> had taken <S%H3947><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and they brought <S%H935><s%> it from Ebenezer <S%H72><s%> to Ashdod. <S%H795><s%>

The Philistines <S%H6430><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> it into the house <S%H1004><s%> of Dagon, <S%H1712><s%> and set <S%H3322><s%> it by <S%H681><s%> Dagon. <S%H1712><s%>

When they of Ashdod <S%H796><s%> arose early <S%H7925><s%> on the next day, <S%H4283><s%> behold, <S%H1712><s%> Dagon was fallen <S%H5307><s%> on his face <S%H6440><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> They took <S%H3947><s%> Dagon, <S%H1712><s%> and set <S%H7725><s%> him in his place <S%H4725><s%> again. <S%H7725><s%>

When they arose early <S%H7925><s%> on the next day <S%H4283><s%> morning, <S%H1242><s%> behold, <S%H1712><s%> Dagon was fallen <S%H5307><s%> on his face <S%H6440><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and the head <S%H7218><s%> of Dagon <S%H1712><s%> and both <S%H8147><s%> the palms <S%H3709><s%> of his hands <S%H3027><s%> were cut off <S%H3772><s%> on the threshold. <S%H4670><s%> Only Dagon <S%H1712><s%>'s torso was intact. <S%H7604><s%>

Therefore neither the priests <S%H3548><s%> of Dagon, <S%H1712><s%> nor any who come <S%H935><s%> into Dagon <S%H1712><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> tread <S%H1869><s%> on the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of Dagon <S%H1712><s%> in Ashdod, <S%H795><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%>

But the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was heavy <S%H3513><s%> on them of Ashdod, <S%H796><s%> and he destroyed <S%H8074><s%> them, <S%H5221><s%> and struck them with tumors, <S%H2914><s%> even Ashdod <S%H795><s%> and its borders. <S%H1366><s%>

When the men <S%H582><s%> of Ashdod <S%H795><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was so, <S%H559><s%> they said, "The ark <S%H727><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall not stay <S%H3427><s%> with us; <S%H3027><s%> for his hand is severe <S%H7185><s%> on us, <S%H1712><s%> and on Dagon our god. <S%H430><s%>"

They sent <S%H7971><s%> therefore and gathered <S%H622><s%> all the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> to them, <S%H559><s%> and said, "What shall we do <S%H6213><s%> with the ark <S%H727><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%>" They answered, <S%H559><s%> "Let the ark <S%H727><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> be carried over <S%H5437><s%> to Gath. <S%H1661><s%>" They carried <S%H5437><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> there. <S%H5437><s%>

It was so, <S%H310><s%> that after they had carried it about, <S%H5437><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was against the city <S%H5892><s%> with a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> confusion: <S%H4103><s%> and he struck <S%H5221><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> both small <S%H6996><s%> and great; <S%H1419><s%> and tumors <S%H2914><s%> broke out on them. <S%H8368><s%>

So they sent <S%H7971><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> to Ekron. <S%H6138><s%> It happened, <S%H727><s%> as the ark of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Ekron, <S%H6138><s%> that the Ekronites <S%H6139><s%> cried out, <S%H2199><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "They have brought about <S%H5437><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to us, <S%H4191><s%> to kill us and our people. <S%H5971><s%>"

They sent <S%H7971><s%> therefore and gathered together <S%H622><s%> all the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and they said, <S%H559><s%> "Send away <S%H7971><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and let it go again <S%H7725><s%> to its own place, <S%H4725><s%> that it not kill <S%H4191><s%> us and our people. <S%H5971><s%>" For there was a deadly <S%H4194><s%> confusion <S%H4103><s%> throughout all the city; <S%H5892><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> heavy there. <S%H3513><s%>

The men <S%H582><s%> who didn't <S%H4191><s%> die were struck <S%H5221><s%> with the tumors; <S%H2914><s%> and the cry <S%H7775><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to heaven. <S%H8064><s%>
